About this item

  • Easy to use, cordless and stress-free: This hot eye mask is perfect for sleeping well and eye fatigue. In fact, about 90% of the hot eye masks come with a cord, so you can be frustrated with "cords" and "heavy...". Salua's Cordless Hot Eye Mask was developed in response to those problems. Not only is it stress-free, but it uses a thin heater that is extremely lightweight at 2.5 oz (74 g). You can relax without any unnecessary irritation
  • (2 Temperature Adjustment & Auto Off Timer) In response to those concerns about "It is difficult to adjust the temperature with a remote controller..." the Salua's eye mask rechargeable is simple. You can easily adjust the temperature with one power button on the main unit. Two adjustment modes: "High Temperature" and "Low". The high temperature mode can be heated to a depth of about 10 minutes after use at a core temperature of 38 to 50 degrees. In addition, it has an auto-off timer that automatically turns off after 30 minutes. You don't have to worry about forgetting to turn it off even when you sleep and relax your mind and body comfortably
  • (100% Smooth Silk for Comfortable Year Round) The surface of the eye mask is made of 100% premium silk that is gentle on the skin and does not get stuffy. Luxurious and rich feel. Keeps you warm in the winter and cool in the summer! This cordless eye mask is easy to use regardless of the season. It fits gently around the eyes so it is thin and firm against light blocking. Perfect for taking a break when you are concerned about napping naps or eye fatigue. By using it as an eye mask without warming it up, it provides high light blocking properties, supporting you a good night's sleep
  • Precautions for Use: Please refrain from using this product. If you are unsure about using it, please consult a physician. People with facial neurology disorders, skin sensory disorders, allergies, skin diseases, and eczema skin irritations, those with sensitive skin; those who have embedding facial surgery such as fractures, orthopedic facial surgeries; Infants, children, seniors, and other people who cannot be aware of heat due to traffic accidents, etc. (Lacic hands. Consult your physician immediately after surgery. ● Pregnancy and nursing. *This is an important period of time when you are prone to changes in your physical condition during premenstrual period, pregnancy, and nursing. We suggest you refrain from purchasing
  • Product Warranty: The warranty period is 3 months from the date of your order. Only when purchased or used in Japan. If you have any problems or defects, please contact our customer service

Product Description

Salua Cordless Eye Mask

Cords get in the way...

It's hard to get your movements.

This was developed in response to those concerns.

Salua's Cordless Hot Eye Mask!

Stress-free and relaxed.

Elastic band for a good fit. One size fits all without having to adjust it.

Comes with an adjustable clip so you can adjust the size to your preference.

Convenient USB rechargeable

Salua's hot eye mask is conveniently USB rechargeable, so

Comes with a cord so you won't have to worry about causing any stress!

In addition, the USB port does not hit your face,

You can use it while charging without stress.

Easy and convenient temperature control function

Anyone can easily adjust the temperature.

With the power button, you can switch between 2 modes: "high temperature" and "low temperature."

After 10 minutes of use, your eyes will be warm and warm.

It also comes with a timer that automatically turns off after 30 minutes.

Perfect before sleeping. You can finally fall asleep!

Relax your eyes and enjoy a good night's sleep.

Comfortable for all year round use

Thin heater, so it weighs only 2.2 oz (63 g).

Made of 100% premium silk, it will keep you warm in the winter and cool in the summer.

Comfortable and luxurious feel that won't get stuffy, making it comfortable all year round.

Even though it is thin, it has excellent light blocking properties, so it can also be used as a regular eye mask.

How are ratings calculated?
To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzes reviews to verify trustworthiness.
